content.title: Dominguez hits Arroyo over 'scandalous' China deals - Rappler
content.desc: 'I don't have to mention the names, I'll just mention some initials. ZTE, for instance,' says Finance Secretary Carlos Dominguez III.

content.title: The ANC Brief: Day of reckoning for Revilla - ABS CBN News
content.desc: ABS CBN News It’s the day of reckoning for former Sen. Bong Revilla in his plunder case. Meanwhile, President Duterte continues to take potshots at a favorite target: the Catholic Church. Here are the stories ANC will be covering today: Ruling on Revilla The promulgation of the plunder case against former Senator Bong Revilla is scheduled today at the Sandiganbayan. ANC will make sure to report on the latest updates on the decision on Revilla and stay in touch with both the prosecution and Revilla’s side. What will the decision mean for the other PDAF cases? Former Ombudsman Conchita Morales said if she...
